page.title: 10Leafield's Amenities.
page.content: 1. Shops. There are 3 shops in the village, the Post Office, Peapell Stores and a butchers. Peapell Stores sells sweets, tins of food, cakes and lots of other things. The Post Office sells stamps, toys, sweets, envelopes, cards, jewellery and clothes. The butchers sells meat, fruit, drinks and vegetables. Our mums use the shops often. We would like to have a little bank and a few other grocery shops. 2. Pubs. There are 2 pubs in our area, The Old George and The Fox. At the Fox they play Aunt Sally, darts and bar billiards and darts at The George. 3. Garages. Our 2 garages are Mr. Carpenter's Wychwood garage and Guys Motors
